name: Tree
description: A mighty tree with deep roots and spreading branches, representing growth, stability, and connection to nature.

person: Someone with deep wisdom who provides shelter and guidance to others
A person who becomes rigid or unwilling to adapt to changing circumstances
creatureTrap: Nature spirits, dryads, or creatures that protect forest areas
Natural hazards like falling branches or entangling roots
place: Ancient groves or forests that offer wisdom and natural resources
Overgrown areas where nature has become wild and impassable
treasure: Natural remedies, wooden items of great craftsmanship, or druidic magic
Resources that require patience to cultivate or are tied to natural cycles
situation: Steady growth and development with strong foundations
Stagnation or being too rooted in place to adapt to new circumstances
